attributes.action: Stop Prescription Charges For Asthamatics In Line With Other Disorders Such As Diabetes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS continues to charge asthmatics for life-saving drugs such as inhalers, whilst other chronic illness sufferers such as those with diabetes continue to receive free prescriptions. The government should review this policy to charge all patients except those exempt for age or income reasons, or make asthmatics exempt for charges for relevant prescriptions.
